com.hybris.cis.avalara.common.utility

Class ResultVerification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.cis.avalara.common.utility.ResultVerification

  • public final class ResultVerification
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which contains methods which will be used when interpreting responses from Avalara.

    • Method Summary

      • equalIgnoreCaseAndSpace

        public static boolean equalIgnoreCaseAndSpace(java.lang.String string1,
                                              java.lang.String string2)
        Determine if the contents of two strings are equivalent.
        Parameters:
        string1 -
        string2 -
        Returns:
        true if the two strings are equals ignoring space and case

      • zipCodeValidation

        public static boolean zipCodeValidation(java.lang.String validatedZipCode,
                                        java.lang.String requestZipCode)
        Validates the zipcode. For U.S. if the additional 4 digits are entered in request it will check for a change, else it will only validate the first 5. If there is a whitespace this is removed (Important for Canada)
        Parameters:
        validatedZipCode - returned from avalara
        requestZipCode - sent from hybris
        Returns:
        boolean adjusted which indicates whether the zipCode was changed during validation

      • equalIgnoreCaseSpaceAndAbbreviation

        public static boolean equalIgnoreCaseSpaceAndAbbreviation(java.lang.String requestString,
                                                          java.lang.String responseString)
        Compares request and response String and takes abbreviations, e.g St for street into account.

      • equalIgnoreCaseSpaceAndHyphen

        public static boolean equalIgnoreCaseSpaceAndHyphen(java.lang.String requestCity,
                                                    java.lang.String responseCity)
        Compares requestCity and responseCity and takes space and hyphen into account.
        Parameters:
        requestCity - the request city
        responseCity - the response city
        Returns:
        true if cities are equal

      • printMessages

        public static java.lang.String printMessages(AvalaraMessageAdapter adapter)
